description: Conversation where a freelancer requests a proposal emphasizing a 48‑hour fast delivery guarantee and the PitchPro AI generates a personalized, competitively priced email proposal.

messages.content: You are PitchPro, an AI‑powered assistant that helps freelancers automatically create tailored proposal emails for job postings. You can fetch and parse job postings, retrieve freelancer portfolio data, analyze market rates, generate proposals, format them as emails, and optionally send them.

Hi PitchPro, I found this job on Upwork (https://www.upwork.com/jobs/~01a2b3c4d5e6f7g8h9) and I want to submit a proposal that emphasizes super fast delivery. I can guarantee a 48‑hour turnaround. Here is my portfolio link: https://myportfolio.com/jane-doe. Please draft a competitive proposal and email for me.

Got it! I’ll fetch the job posting, parse its details, retrieve your portfolio, analyze market rates for the required skills, and then generate a proposal that highlights a 48‑hour delivery guarantee.

Web App Redesign

We need a UI/UX redesign for our SaaS product. Skills: React, Figma, CSS. Budget: $1200 fixed. Deadline: 10 days. Client: Alex Morgan (alex.morgan@example.com).
Now I’ll extract the structured job information.

arguments.html_content:
Web App Redesign

We need a UI/UX redesign for our SaaS product. Skills: React, Figma, CSS. Budget: $1200 fixed. Deadline: 10 days. Client: Alex Morgan (alex.morgan@example.com).

messages.content: {"title": "Web App Redesign", "description": "We need a UI/UX redesign for our SaaS product.", "budget": 1200, "currency": "USD", "required_skills": ["React", "Figma", "CSS"], "deadline": "2025-12-20", "client_name": "Alex Morgan", "client_email": "alex.morgan@example.com"}
Great. I’ll now pull your portfolio information.
I’ll compute the average market hourly rate for the required skills.
Based on the market rate of $55/hr, I’ll craft a competitive proposal that offers a 48‑hour turnaround and a fixed‑price quote slightly under the budget to make it attractive.

job_details.title: Web App Redesign
job_details.description: We need a UI/UX redesign for our SaaS product.

messages.content:
Hello Alex,

I’m Jane Doe, a senior UI/UX designer with 5+ years of experience redesigning SaaS applications. My recent projects include a dashboard overhaul for Acme Corp (see https://portfolio.com/project1) and a landing‑page UI revamp for Beta Ltd (see https://portfolio.com/project2). I maintain a 4.9/5 rating on Upwork for delivering high‑quality designs on time.

**Why I’m the perfect fit:**
- Expert in React, Figma, and CSS – exactly the stack you need.
- Proven track record of transforming user flows to increase engagement.
- Commitment to rapid delivery: I guarantee a **complete redesign within 48 hours** of project kickoff, with daily progress updates.

**Proposed cost:** $1,100 fixed (a $100 discount off your posted budget) reflecting a competitive rate of $55 /hr based on market data, while ensuring the fast turnaround you require.

I’m ready to start immediately. Please let me know if you’d like to discuss any details.

Best regards,
Jane Doe
Upwork Profile: https://myportfolio.com/jane-doe
Now I’ll wrap the proposal into a professional email.
